name: BloodBath (itch) (Tiberiusuciu)
description:
The thematic for Ludum Dare 44 is Your life is currency
So I present you BloodBath

You are a blood mage, the last of your kind. Every knight is after you so survive as long as you can!

Use your mouth to cycle through your spells and cast them. Move around with the arrows keys or "WASD"

Special shout out to twitch user TheLifeIsYours for hanging out in the chat while I was live-streaming
